item.title: [COLOR yellow][COLOR lime]*[/COLOR]LOS MEJORES SERVIDORES IP DEL MOMENTO
[COLOR white].[/COLOR][COLOR blue][B] Ryu[/B] [/COLOR][COLOR white ][I] M3U Listas[/I][/COLOR]
[B][COLOR green] RYU[COLOR blue] Daily updates[COLOR blue] Servers[COLOR green][/COLOR][/B]

regex.name: makelist
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:44.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/44.0 Iceweasel/44.0

regex.name: getUrl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re, requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,): first_ip = re.findall("x_first_ip.+?'(.*?)'", page_data)[0] first_c = re.findall("x_first_c.+?'(.*?)'", page_data)[0] ket2 = re.findall("ket2.+?'(.*?)'", page_data)[0] first_ua = re.findall("x_first_ua.+?'(.*?)'", page_data)[0] preurl = 'http://tmg.ustreamix.com/' # here is the server url which changed most of time url = preurl + 'stats.php?p=' + first_ip + '&C=' + first_c + '&Ket=' + ket2 source = requests.get(url, headers = {'Referer': 'https://v2.ustreamix.com/[makelist.param1]', 'User-Agent': first_ua, 'Accept': '*/*'}).text tok = re.findall('var jdtk="(.*?)"', source)[0] return preurl + 'tmg.m3u8?' + '[makelist.param1]' + '&token=' + tok
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:44.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/44.0 Iceweasel/44.0

regex.name: makelist
makelist2
getUrl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re, requests, urllib2, urllib def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):# streamwatcher2013 source = re.findall(r'(?:m3u8|pxstream)', page_data)[0] if 'm3u8' in source: return re.findall('[",\'](h.*(?:m3u8).*?)[",\']', page_data)[0] + '|User-Agent=iPad&Referer=[makelist2.param1]' elif 'm3u8' not in source: html = re.findall('[",\'](h.*(?:pxstream).*?)[",\']', page_data)[0] source = requests.get(html, headers = {'Referer': '[makelist2.param1]', 'User-Agent': 'iPad', 'Accept': 'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8'}).text stream = re.findall('[",\'](h.*?m3u8)[",\']', source)[0] location = urllib2.urlopen(stream) return location.geturl()

item.title: [COLOR turquoise]Me-Buscan [COLOR cyan]Acestream[/COLOR] ESP + intl
item.regex:
makelist [COLOR bisque] [makelist.param3] [/COLOR] plugin://program.plexus/?url=$doregex[get-link]&mode=1&name=[makelist.param3] http://mebuscan.net/[makelist.param1]|Referer=http://mebuscan.net/ thumb link title Logo" src="(.*?)".*?ventana1\((\d*)\)>
(.*?)<\/strong> http://mebuscan.net

regex.name: url
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re strurl = (re.findall('"fmt_stream_map.*?(http[^|]*)', page_data)[0]).replace('\\u0026', '&').replace('\\u003d', '=') return strurl

[B][COLOR lawngreen]• [B][COLOR white]TESTE ustreamix.com (Sports Devil)[/B][/COLOR] plugin://plugin.video.SportsDevil/?mode=1&item=catcher%3Dstreams%26url=http://v2.ustreamix.com/stream.php?id=benfica-tv-alternative-2 http://i.imgur.com/Frawzcq.png
